titleStmt.title: SII 13.201: original edition by G.V. Srinivasa Rao
No. 201. (A.R. No. 382 of 1924.) MĒLAPPAḺUVŪR, UDAIYARPALAIYAM TALUK, TRICHINOPOLY DISTRICT. ON THE SOUTH WALL OF THE CHŌḶĒŚVARA SHRINE, AGASTYĒŚVARA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This records an agreement given by seven temple servants (taḷippaṭṭuḍaiyār) to burn a perpetual lamp in the shrine on the north side of the temple of Mahādēva of Avanigandharvva-Īśvara-gṛiham, a dēvadāna in Kuṉṟak-kūṟṟam with the interest on ten kaḻañju of gold now received by them from the two (classes of) nagarattār with whom the amount had been originally deposited by the donor, Vīraśōḻa Aṇukkaṉ Śiṟiyappi Maḻapāḍi of Avanigandarvvapuram in the 1[6]th year of Parakēsarivarman Uttama-Chōḷa in the regime of Aḍigaḷ Paḻuvēṭṭaraiyar Kaṇḍaṉ Maṟavaṉār. At the time of the transfer of this amount the administration of the temple is said to have been vested with one Kauśikaṉ Nakkaṉ Māṟapirāṉ. The inscription may be assigned to Rājarāja I.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . koirācakecaripaṉmaṟku yāṇṭu 9Ā
vatu kuṉṟakkūṟṟattu devatāṉam Avaṉikandharvva
īśvara gṛhattu mahādevar vaṭavāy śrīkoyilukku A
vaṉikandharvvapurattu viracoḻaaṇukkaṉ ciṟiyappi maḻapā
ṭi cantrātittavallum vaitta nontāviḷakku Oṉṟinik
ku paṭiyuḻakkiṉāl nicatamuḻakku neyyeriya vaitta poṉ
10 patiṉkaḻañcum śrīkopparakecaripaṉmarkku yāṇṭu Uttamacoḻarkku 16Āvatu A
ṭikaḷ paḻu
veṭṭaraiyar kaṇṭaṉ maṟavaṉār Aruḷiceyya śrīkāryyam Ārāyāniṟkka Iraṇṭu nakarattārum ciṟi
yappi maḻa
vāṭi vaitta poṉ patiṉkaḻañcum koṇṭu Iraṇṭu nakarattārum palicai Iṭṭu vārāniṟkiṉṟa poṉ patiṉkaḻa
ñcum śrīkāryyam Ārāyāniṉṟa kauśikan nakkan māṟapirāṉ Ārācciyil Ippoṉ patiṉ kaḻañcum vāṅkikoṇṭu
cantrādittaval Iravum pakalum Oru nontāviḷa
kku Erippomānom Ittaḷip pa
ṭṭuṭaiyom Eḻuvom Itu panmāheśvara rakṣai .
Digital edition of SII 13.201 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
